√yup 'obstruct'

[present: [4.] yupyati  ]

perfect: yuyópa  yuyopimá  

aorist: [2.] ayupat   -- [3.] ayūyupan etc.  

[future: yopiṣyati  yopitā  ]

verbal: yupitá  

secondary: intensive: yoyupyáte etc.   -- causative: yopáyati etc.  

derivatives: yū́pa V.+  -yópana V.  yoyupana C1.
